parties.raw_snippet: TRANSFER AND SERVICING AGREEMENT, dated as of January 29, 2020 (this “Agreement”), among VERIZON OWNER TRUST 2020-A, a Delaware statutory trust, as issuer (the “Issuer”), VERIZON ABS LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, as depositor (the “Depositor”), and Cellco Partnership d/b/a Verizon Wireless, a Delaware general partnership (“Cellco”), as servicer (in such capacity, the “Servicer”), as marketing agent (in such capacity, the “Marketing Agent”) and as custodian (in such capacity, the “Custodian”).
parties.reasoning: The header/introductory paragraph of the agreement explicitly lists the contracting parties and their roles; I copied the paragraph that names each entity and its capacity.

contract_type.raw_snippet: TRANSFER AND SERVICING AGREEMENT, dated as of January 29, 2020 (this “Agreement”), among VERIZON OWNER TRUST 2020-A, a Delaware statutory trust, as issuer (the “Issuer”), VERIZON ABS LLC, a Delaware limited liability company, as depositor (the “Depositor”), and Cellco Partnership d/b/a Verizon Wireless, a Delaware general partnership (“Cellco”), as servicer (in such capacity, the “Servicer”), as marketing agent (in such capacity, the “Marketing Agent”) and as custodian (in such capacity, the “Custodian”).
contract_type.reasoning: The document title and the core obligations (see Section 3.1: the Issuer engages Cellco as the Servicer of the Receivables) show the primary purpose is servicing and transfer of receivables — i.e., a service arrangement for servicing receivables. Therefore classifies as a Service Agreement.

agreement_date.reasoning: The contract header and the clause immediately preceding the Agreement state 'Dated as of January 29, 2020' and the Agreement is repeatedly described as 'dated as of January 29, 2020.' This is the signing/date-of-agreement.

effective_date.reasoning: There is no separate "Effective Date" phrase; the Agreement is 'dated as of January 29, 2020' and many provisions are stated to be effective on the "Closing Date." Appendix A defines "Closing Date" as January 29, 2020, which therefore functions as the effective date.

expiration_date.raw_snippet: Section 8.3 Termination. This Agreement will terminate on the earlier to occur of (a) the date upon which the last remaining Receivable is paid in full, settled, sold or written off and any amounts received are applied and (b) the Issuer is terminated under Section 8.1 of the Trust Agreement.
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 8.3 provides the termination rule for the Agreement — it terminates upon the earlier of the final collection/write-off of Receivables or termination of the Issuer per the Trust Agreement. This is a relative termination formulation rather than a fixed calendar date.
expiration_date.normalized_value: the earlier to occur of (a) the date upon which the last remaining Receivable is paid in full, settled, sold or written off and any amounts received are applied and (b) the Issuer is terminated under Section 8.1 of the Trust Agreement

governing_law.raw_snippet: Section 10.5 GOVERNING LAW. THIS AGREEMENT, INCLUDING THE RIGHTS AND DUTIES OF THE PARTIES HERETO, SHALL BE GOVERNED BY, AND CONSTRUED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, THE INTERNAL LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK (INCLUDING SECTIONS 5-1401 AND 5-1402 OF THE GENERAL OBLIGATIONS LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, BUT WITHOUT REGARD TO ANY OTHERWISE APPLICABLE CONFLICTS OF LAW PRINCIPLES). FOR PURPOSES OF THE UCC, NEW YORK SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE THE SECURITIES INTERMEDIARY’S JURISDICTION, AND THE LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK SHALL GOVERN ALL ISSUES SPECIFIED IN ARTICLE 2(1) OF THE HAGUE SECURITIES CONVENTION. NOTWITHSTANDING SECTION 10.1 OF THIS AGREEMENT, THE PARTIES WILL NOT AGREE TO AMEND THIS AGREEMENT TO CHANGE THE GOVERNING LAW TO ANY LAW OTHER THAN THE LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK.
governing_law.reasoning: Section 10.5 is the governing law clause and explicitly names the state whose laws govern the Agreement.

notice_period.reasoning: I searched the Agreement for any clause requiring advance notice to prevent automatic renewal or stating an auto-renewal with a notice-to-terminate window. The document contains termination, resignation and replacement provisions but no automatic renewal or a notice period to prevent renewal; therefore no applicable "notice period to terminate renewal" is found.

renewal_term.reasoning: The Agreement does not include any automatic renewal language or specify renewal terms. Termination is tied to final collection or Issuer termination rather than renewal, so there is no renewal term to extract.
